Section.name: About AIT
Section.description:
Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology (AIT), Chikmagalur was established in 1980 under Adhichunchanagiri Shikshana Trust. The institute is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belgaum. It is recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi, and accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA), New Delhi. It is an ISO 9001:2008 certified institute. The objective of the institute is committed to quality education, training & research providing quality technical education, and molding the younger generation with the spirit of service to society. The institute is located in the famous Chickmagalur city which is 240 km from Bangalore, the capital of Karnataka, and well connected by bus routes to all the major cities and towns of the state. The nearest railway station is at Kadur (or Birur) on the Bangalore - Bombay broad gauge line, which is 35 km away.
Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology COMEDK Cutoff 2024 is out. The table below shows the cutoff rank for GM (General Merit) category under Round 1:
Department of Civil Engineering

Department of Chemistry
Department of Mathematics
Department of Business Administration
Department of Structural Engineering
Department of Thermal Power Engineering
Department of Machine Design
Amphitheatre
A huge amphi theatre provides a platform for all cultural and academic activities of the Institute.
Library
The Institute has a well-equipped library housed in a spacious building which has a collection of about 46,000 volumes covering all branches of science, engineering, and management subjects. There are about 120 subscribed technical journals and periodicals in the reference section.
Hostel
The Institute provides good residential hostel accommodation to the students. There are 02 Boys' Hostels with accommodation for 700 male students and 01 Girls' Hostel with accommodation for 300 female students.
